name: LRP's National Institute
content: LRP’s National Institute on Legal Issues of Educating Individuals with Disabilities® helps you keep your special education programs in compliance with federal education and disability laws. The nation’s leading special education experts show you and your staff how to turn legal mandates into best practices, so you can ensure that students receive appropriate services. Year after year, the Institute delivers high-quality professional development and brings together special educators from around the country. URL: Brochure: https://go.evvnt.com/491397-2?pid=4868 Time: 7:00 am to 6:00 pm Prices: Super Savers (ends Dec. 11, 2019): USD 1370.0, Early Bird (ends March 5, 2020): USD 1420.0, Standard Rate (ends May 2, 2020): USD 1520.0, On-Site (after May 2,2020): USD 1570.0 Speakers: Henry Winkler, Karen Haase, Tiffany Kesslar, Jan Tomsky, Julie J. Weatherly Venue Details: New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center, 900 Convention Center Boulevard, New Orleans, 70130, United States
